channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ric Flair And Other Legends Mourn The Death Of Hulk Hogan
item.description: Hulk Hogan died at 71. Despite scandals, his legacy shaped pro wrestling forever. Ric Flair and others paid tribute to his iconic run and enduring imp...

item.title: Nuro, Uber And Lucid Join Robotaxi Race. Will Luxury Be Key?
item.description: The three companies have inked a big deal with large investments, and it means Nuro's robotaxi will be based on an expensive car. How does cost factor...

item.title: Rejecting The Monolith: How Trump’s AI Policy Preserves Human Intent
item.description: Trump’s AI policy signals a shift in power. This article explores the stakes: control, consent, and why human intent must remain the first move.

item.title: Geological Clues Connect Arizona Meteor Impact To Massive Landslide In Grand Canyon
item.description: A new study highlights the striking coincidence in the geologic ages of the famous Meteor Crater in Arizona and a landslide dam that blocked the Color...

item.title: Chan Zuckerberg Initiative Introduces New GREmLN Model For Genetics
item.description: Scientists are quickly developing new genomic models with AI

item.title: How much extra is the gift wrap?
item.description: One way to turn a product or service into a story is to gift wrap it. Yes, you did my taxes, but did you include a two-page summary and a useful folde...

item.title: Seeing the lottery
item.description: At least the Powerball tells the truth. In a state run lottery, the deal is very simple: You pay your money, you take your chances. The government ran...

item.title: Casual cruelty
item.description: Is it okay to dress your cat in a ridiculous costume? What about giving a poodle a haircut that subjects him to ridicule? The cat and the dog probably...

item.title: Resilience is a practice
item.description: It’s easy to imagine that we should do our work and then, when it doesn’t work as we hope, improvise to fix it. But perhaps our work is to show up rea...

item.title: Lunging
